subject: Self Care
title: The Pause Response
description: A quick win: understand The Pause Response.

hook.text: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space lies your freedom. Viktor Frankl knew it.

buildup.text: Self-regulation starts with the pause â€” the moment between feeling the emotion and acting on it.

discovery.text: The pause activates the prefrontal cortex, giving the rational brain time to override the emotional impulse.

twist.text: The pause feels unnatural because evolution rewarded fast reactions. Slowing down is a modern survival skill.

climax.text: Practice daily: before replying to a charged email, before responding in an argument, before making any decision angry.

punchline.text: Master the pause. It's where wisdom lives.

quiz.question: What does the pause between stimulus and response activate?
options: The prefrontal cortex for rational processing
